de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientMultiChannel


  • public interface IClientMultiChannel
    It's possible to define incoming and outgoing channels. The methods allow to manipulate the default behavior of the channel concept.
    was:
    ClientMultiChannel.java

    • Method Detail

      • getAllowedOutputChannels

        int[] getAllowedOutputChannels(Subproject subproject,
                             Email email,
                             Customer customer)
        Returns a bit field with possible Outgoing channels for this subproject / customer/ email constellation
        Parameters:
        subproject - subproject of the email
        email - the current email
        customer - customer of the email
        Returns:
        the allowed channels (e.g. the result contains Email.TYPE_EMAIL9

      • isAutoCite

        boolean isAutoCite(int type,
                 Subproject s)
        Determines if automatic citation of incoming item is enabled
        Parameters:
        type - type of email
        s - subproject of the current answer
        Returns:
        true if the citation is allowed.

      • isDefaultTextEnabled

        boolean isDefaultTextEnabled(int type,
                           Subproject s)
        Checks if it's appropriate to insert a default text into the answer
        Parameters:
        type - type of answer
        s - subproject of the current answer
        Returns:
        true if the default text object may be inserted, false otherwise
